phase3.gui.WidgetFactory



class WidgetFactory;
Allows for the easy creation of tedious SWT Widgets and Layouts.

Authors:
Zachery Burris (zburris@uncc.edu) and Richard Voelker (rvoelker@uncc.edu)

Date:
April 10, 2014

static GridLayout createGridLayout(int columns);
Creates a new GridLayout with dimensions from the Dimen class.

Params:
direction The direction the GridLayout is going in. SWT.VERTICAL or SWT.HORIZONTAL.

Returns:
The GridLayout.

Date:
April 10, 2014

static GridData createGridData(int colSpan);
Creates a new GridData item with the specified column span.

Returns:
The GridData.

Date:
April 10, 2014
